src:
Trk dveh vozi; danes ponoči in jutri obilnejše padavine
04 Nov 2019, 17:15 by M. L.-S.
Danes ob 16.03 sta se na cesti Grad Otočec—Struga, občina Novo mesto, zaleteli dve osebni vozili. V nesreči se je ena oseba poškodovala in so jo reševalci nujne medicinske pomoči ZD Novo mesto oskrbeli na kraju in odpeljali v Splošno bolnišnico Novo mesto. Gasilci GRC Novo mesto so zavarovali kraj, odklopili akumulatorja, nudili pomoč policiji in vlečni službi ter počistili cestišče.

Jutri brez elektrike

Elektro Ljubljana d.d., Distribucijska enota Novo mesto nadzorništvo Šentjernej obvešča odjemalce, da bo jutri od 8.00 do 10.00 ure zaradi del na distribucijskem omrežju in napravah prekinjena dobava električne energije odjemalcem, ki so oskrbovani iz TP VINJI VRH - STRAŽA.
Elektro Ljubljana d.d., Distribucijska enota Novo mesto nadzorništvo Šentjernej obvešča odjemalce, da bo jutri od 8.00 do 10.00 zaradi del na distribucijskem omrežju in napravah prekinjena dobava električne energije odjemalcem, ki so oskrbovani iz TP GOR. STARA VAS.
Elektro Celje, Distribucijska enota Krško, Področje nadzorništva Mokronog obvešča odjemalce električne energije, da bo zaradi rednih vzdrževalnih del na elektroenergetskih napravah prekinjena dobava električne energije na območju transformatorske postaje Gorenji Mokronog, Trebelno, Črpališče Trebelno, Vrh Trebelno, Gorenje Zabukovje in Dolenje Zabukovje in sicer jutri med 8.15 in 9.00 uro in med 13.30 in 14.15.
V primeru slabega vremena bodo dela prestavljena.

Opozorilo

Po podatkih Agencije RS za okolje se pričakuje v noči na torek in v torek do večera obilnejše padavine z dolgotrajnimi nalivi. Krajevno bo v zahodni in deloma južni ter osrednji Sloveniji predvidoma padlo od 50 do okoli 100 l/m2, drugod pa od 20 do okoli 50 l/m2 dežja. Dež bo ponehal v torek zvečer.
text:
The collision of two drives; heavy rainfall tonight and tomorrow
04 Nov 2019, 17:15 by M. L.-S.
Today at 16.03, two passenger cars hit the road Otočec-Struga Castle, Novo mesto municipality. In the accident, one person was injured and was taken to the scene by the emergency room ambulance of the Novo mesto Medical Center and taken to the Novo mesto General Hospital. GRC Novo mesto firefighters secured the place, disconnected the battery, assisted police and towing services and cleared the roadway.

No electricity tomorrow

Elektro Ljubljana dd, Distribution Unit Novo mesto, Šentjernej Supervisory, informs customers that from 8:00 to 10:00 tomorrow due to works on the distribution network and devices, the supply of electricity will be interrupted to customers supplied by TP VINJI VRH - STRAŽA.
Elektro Ljubljana d.d., Distribution unit Novo mesto, Šentjernej supervisory, informs customers that tomorrow from 8.00 to 10.00 due to works on the distribution network and devices, the supply of electricity to customers supplied from TP GOR will be interrupted. OLD YOU.
Elektro Celje, Krško Distribution Unit, Mokronog Supervision Division informs electricity customers that, due to regular maintenance work on power plants, electricity supply will be interrupted in the area of the Gorenji Mokronog transformer station, Trebelno, Trebelno pumping station, Trebelno peak, Gorenje Zabukovje and Dolenje Zabukovje. tomorrow between 8.15am and 9.00am and between 1.30pm and 2.15pm.
In case of inclement weather, the works will be rescheduled.

Warning

According to the Environmental Agency of the Republic of Slovenia, heavy rainfall and heavy rainfall are expected on Tuesday nights and Tuesday nights. Locally, in western and partly southern and central Slovenia, it is estimated that 50 to 100 l / m2 will fall, and 20 to 50 l / m2 of rain elsewhere. The rain will end on Tuesday night.
